scripts.bench:latency: npx -y autocannon -c 1 -d 30 -m POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -b '{"message":"This is a test message"}' http://localhost:5000/api/chat
scripts.bench:parallel: npx -y autocannon -c 5 -d 30 -m POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -b '{"message":"This is a test message"}' http://localhost:5000/api/chat
